item.title: Hugo 搭建个人博客
item.description: 1.Download and Install 需要安装git和go； git环境搭建参考： git环境搭建 go环境搭建参考： go环境搭建 1 2 3 4 5 mkdir $HOME/src cd $HOME/src git clone https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo.git cd hugo go install --tags extended 2.Create a New Site 1 hugo new site boke 3.Add a Theme 1 2 3 cd boke git clone https://github.com/flysnow-org/maupassant-hugo.git themes/maupassant echo 'theme = "maupassant"' >> config.toml 4.Add Some Content 1 2 hugo new content/posts/hugo搭建个人博客.
